features: WOOD CAR FRESHENERS: Drift car air fresheners are made to uproot your typical air freshener. We've combined sophisticated, functional design with real, designer and luxury grade scents. Metal visor clip not included in refill pack.

MADE IN THE USA: Our wood freshener is made right here in the USA from sustainably sourced wood, and magnetized to perfectly fit on your car visor with our metal clip. Our Teak scent has hints of fresh tobacco leaf, teakwood and musk.
LONG LASTING: Crafted with our drift natural essential and fragrance oil blends to deliver a great scent free of harmful chemicals all day. Looks good, smells good, all good.
REFILLABLE SCENTS: Keep scent sealed in bag and out of the sun until ready for use. Replace the scent block at minimum every 30 days. Metal visor clip not included in refill pack.
REFILLABLE SCENTS: Keep scent sealed in bag and out of the sun until ready for use. Replace the scent block at minimum every 30 days. Do not use on any other surface than provided metal visor clip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting great scents
reviews.reviewText: Love the scents. They’re not over powering when you first open the pack yet they last a good while. Don’t touch the wood on accident as the smell transfers easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good!!
reviews.reviewText: I was on the fence about getting this. But I’m glad I did get it. It’s the best air freshener I’ve ever smelled and it’s beautiful too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a strong scent
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these, one for me and one for my son. I like the concept of the holder and the wooden block, it's nice and neat. The scent is nice but not as strong as expected, I don't think I'll get 30 days out of it so that is disappointing. I can't say if I'll buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love the look and smell
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Teak for my BMW and the scent was perfect. If luxury had a smell this would be it. I love that it doesn’t smell fake. It gives that new car vibe. However, the scent isn’t as strong as I would like. Straight out the package it’s very powerful but becomes much weaker after a few days. I can smell it but backseat passengers not as much. I will purchase another. I’m hoping having two at the same time will help with the strength and longevity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Still smells after two months
reviews.reviewText: I think it was a little confusing because you get a black bag, a clip, the oily wood in another black bag. You're supposed to put the wood away when you're not in the car or I think during summer months. I haven't done that, I bought it for my boyfriends car. The smell is really nice, however it was really overpowering the first week it was in there (probably should have put it in the black bag, but it's his car and his nose). I got this for his in his Christmas stocking and it's now almost the second week of February and it still smells good. I'd purchase this again for sure

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Good idea but it doesn’t last
reviews.reviewText: The overall idea of this product is good. The problem is that the scent lasts 2 weeks at most. I did not use the scent retaining bag. It’s unrealistic to be messing with an air freshener every time you enter and exit the vehicle.If changes were made and advertised, I would try this product again. For example, if no retention bag was necessary, and the scent was advertised to last 6 weeks. Even if it only lasted 4 weeks, I could get on board. I have little kids that smell like McDonald’s and feet.The amber scent was pleasant. Everything but the longevity is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wraps you in a subtle teak scent
reviews.reviewText: This is a gorgeous air freshener for your car! The sleek and sophisticated design looks amazing in my black leather and brown wood interior. It fits right on your visor and doesn’t block an air vent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the scent but needs to last longer
reviews.reviewText: I really like the way this smells (similar to Anthropolgy Volcano scent) however it's only been a few days that I have had this in my car and the smell is already fading where I almost don't notice it. I really like the scent so maybe I will give this product another try.
